headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Southern SA Super Autos Updated
content:
Southern SA Super Autos has updated its stock to include some of Los Santos’ most popular automobile models, such as:
- Ocelot Jackal
- Ubermacht Oracle XS
- Benefactor Schafter

...as well as many more. As you encounter new vehicles during the Heists, they’ll become available for purchase, so keep checking the latest stock on SouthernSanAndreasSuperAutos.com
